Let me compute a^T x. Substituting x, we get a^T [(1 - t)x1 + t x2] = (1 - t)a^T x1 + t a^T x2. Since both a^T x1 and a^T x2 are between α and β, their weighted average should also be between α and β. That makes sense because linear functions preserve convex combinations.
